DOC.brief_summary: The current study pilot , double blind , randomize control trial ( 1 ) evaluate feasibility online obstructive sleep apnea ( OSA ) screen intervention , ( 2 ) estimate effect size planning future study , ( 3 ) test hypothesis intervention , compare control condition , would lead individual discuss OSA healthcare provider .
DOC.brief_title: Screening Obstructive Sleep Apnea Among Members Internet Weight Loss Community
DOC.criteria: Member SparkPeople.com community log within previous month Live US Prior diagnosis OSA Prior discussion healthcare provider OSA
